/usr/bin/g++    -fopenmp -pthread -g -O2   CMakeFiles/showsourcedb.dir/showsourcedb.cc.o  -o showsourcedb -rdynamic libparmdb.so ../../../LCS/Common/src/libcommon.so ../../../LCS/Blob/src/libblob.so ../../LMWCommon/src/liblmwcommon.so -llog4cplus -lpthread -lcasa_tables -lcasa_casa -lhdf5 -lpthread -lz -ldl -lm -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 -lpthread -lz -ldl -lm -lm -ldl ../../../LCS/Blob/src/libblob.so ../../../LCS/Common/src/libcommon.so -lcasa_tables -lcasa_casa -lhdf5_hl -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/scratch/software/src/pyimager/build/gnu_opt/CEP/ParmDB/src:/scratch/software/src/pyimager/build/gnu_opt/LCS/Common/src:/scratch/software/src/pyimager/build/gnu_opt/LCS/Blob/src:/scratch/software/src/pyimager/build/gnu_opt/CEP/LMWCommon/src:
